panels.description: Current number of DNS requests in process in the server. This number is expected to be zero with low loads.

panels.title: Requests per ${period}s

panels.description: Rate per ${period}s of questions contained in requests to the DNS server, by class and type.
panels.title: Questions per ${period}s by class and type

panels.description: Number of requests in process in the DNS server. Under low load, this is expected to be zero.
panels.title: Requests in process

panels.description: Server response codes per ${period}s with a 2 minutes rate
panels.title: Response codes per ${period}s

panels.title: DNS over TLS dials by IP address per ${period}s

panels.title: DNS over HTTPs dials by URL per ${period}s

panels.title: Fallback plaintext DNS dials per ${period}s

panels.title: Blocked hostnames

panels.title: Blocked IP addresses

panels.description: Total number of blocked IP prefixes (CIDRs) set in the filter
panels.title: Blocked IP prefixes

panels.description: Rate per ${period}s of filtered out hostnames by question class and type
panels.title: Hostnames filtered per ${period}s

panels.title: Cache hit and miss per ${period}s

panels.description: Number of entries present in the cache
